list_definition.definition: (a lamp for projecting) a circle of light that is thrown on to a small area

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The actor was lit by a single spotlight in the middle of the stage.

list_definition.definition: to show up clearly or draw attention to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The incident spotlighted the difficulties with which we were faced.
